name: Work Approval Inc.
description:
you know that feeling of anxiety when your supposed to be doing homework, but your playing games instead? you ever want to experience that in game form?

you play as a man. he sure is bored.

you've been supplied with a mood meter to show how bored you are, and a clock. your goal is to make it through the day and go home.

you get to play dino game

Controls: 

- mouse

- spacebar to make dino jump
